channel.title: little blue monkey on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in little blue monkey on Barefoot Rob

item.title: phone wont charge
item.description: 16:19 Sunday 13 September 2015 JST I’m optimistic that I can get it repaired, but my iPhone will no longer accept a charge after it got soaked. As promised, I shan’t buy another iPhone, and now I may be a bit more specific: I may buy a waterproof phone if I can’t get this one repaired.
